dict.string:
<#annotation#>
- (TTView *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            TTView *view = [[TTView alloc] initWithCircleWidth:0];
            view;
        });
        
    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (UIButton *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            UIButton *button = [[UIButton alloc] init];
            [button setBackgroundImage:[UIImage imageNamed:@"" withTop:0 andLeft:0] forState:UIControlStateNormal];
            [button setBackgroundImage:[UIImage imageNamed:@"" withTop:0 andLeft:0] forState:UIControlStateHighlighted];
            
            button;
        });
        
        
    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (TTLabel *)<#instanceName#>{
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> = ({
            TTLabel *label = [[TTLabel alloc] init];
            label.backgroundColor = [UIColor clearColor];
            label.font = kFont;
            label.textColor = kColor;
            label.numberOfLines = 1;
            label.textAlignment =NSTextAlignmentLeft;
            label.text = @"";
            label;
        });
        
    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (UIView *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            UIView *view = [[UIView alloc] init];
            
            view;
        });

    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (UIButton *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            UIButton *button = [[UIButton alloc] init];
            //        button.backgroundColor = [UIColor greenColor];
            [button setBackgroundImage:[UIImage imageNamed<#name#>  WithTop:0 Left:0] forState:UIControlStateNormal];
            [button setBackgroundImage:[UIImage imageNamed<#name#>  WithTop:0 Left:0] forState:UIControlStateHighlighted];
            [button addTarget:self action:@selector(<#name#>Action) forControlEvents:UIControlEventTouchUpInside];
            button;
        });

    
    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (UITableView *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            UITableView *tableView = [[UITableView alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectZero style:UITableViewStyleGrouped];
            tableView.delegate = self;
            tableView.dataSource = self;
            tableView.separatorStyle = UITableViewCellSeparatorStyleNone;
            tableView.bounces = NO;
            tableView;
        });

    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (TTImageView *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            TTImageView *view = [[TTImageView alloc] initWithCircleWidth:0];
            view.image = [UIImage imageNamed:@""];
            view;
        });
        
    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (UIImageView *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> =  ({
            UIImageView *imageView = [UIImageView new];
            imageView.backgroundColor = [UIColor lightGrayColor];
            imageView.image = [UIImage imageNamed<#name#>];
            imageView;
        });

    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}

<#annotation#>
- (UILabel *)<#instanceName#> {
    if (!_<#instanceName#>) {
        _<#instanceName#> = ({
            UILabel *label = [[UILabel alloc] init];
            label.backgroundColor = [UIColor clearColor];
//            label.font = kFont18;
//            label.textColor = kColor_ffffff;
            label.numberOfLines = 1;
            label.textAlignment =NSTextAlignmentCenter;
            [label sizeToFit];
            label;
        });
        
    }
    return _<#instanceName#>;
}
